name: unimobiliare
description: Platforma de Unificare Imobiliară din România

scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,admin,web -c blue,green,yellow "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=packages/shared && npm run build --workspace=packages/database
scripts.build:all: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build:packages && npm run db:generate
